26#ifndef VICUS_WindowH
27#define VICUS_WindowH
28
29#include "VICUS_CodeGenMacros.h"
30#include "VICUS_Constants.h"
31#include "VICUS_AbstractDBElement.h"
32#include "VICUS_WindowFrame.h"

38#include <QString>
39#include <QColor>
40
41namespace VICUS {
42
44class Window : public AbstractDBElement {
45public:
46
47 enum Method {
48 M_None, // Keyword: None 'None'
49 M_Fraction, // Keyword: Fraction 'Fraction of area'
50 M_ConstantWidth, // Keyword: ConstantWidth 'Constant width'
51 NUM_M
52 };
53
54 enum para_t {
55 P_FrameWidth, // Keyword: FrameWidth [m] 'Frame width of the window'
56 P_FrameFraction, // Keyword: FrameFraction [---] 'Frame area fraction of the window'
57 P_DividerWidth, // Keyword: DividerWidth [m] 'Divider width of the window'
58 P_DividerFraction, // Keyword: DividerFraction [---] 'Divider area fraction of the window'
59 P_ReductionFactor, // Keyword: ReductionFactor [---] 'Reduction factor for dynamic shading'
60 NUM_P
61 };
62
63 // *** PUBLIC MEMBER FUNCTIONS ***
64
65 VICUS_READWRITE_OVERRIDE
66 VICUS_COMPARE_WITH_ID
67
69 ComparisonResult equal(const AbstractDBElement *other) const override;
70
72 bool isValid() const;
73
75 bool calculateUValue(double & UValue,
76 const VICUS::Database<Material> & materials,
77 const VICUS::Database<WindowGlazingSystem> & glazingSystems,
78 double ri, double re) const;
79
80 // *** PUBLIC MEMBER VARIABLES ***
81
82 //:inherited unsigned int m_id = INVALID_ID; // XML:A:required
83 //:inherited IBK::MultiLanguageString m_displayName; // XML:A
84 //:inherited QColor m_color; // XML:A
85
87 unsigned int m_idGlazingSystem = INVALID_ID; // XML:A
88
90 QString m_notes; // XML:E
91
93 QString m_dataSource; // XML:E
94
96 Method m_methodFrame = NUM_M; // XML::A
97
99 Method m_methodDivider = NUM_M; // XML::A
100
102 IBK::Parameter m_para[NUM_P]; // XML:E
103
105 WindowFrame m_frame; // XML:E
107 WindowDivider m_divider; // XML:E
108
109};
110
111} // namespace VICUS
112
113
114#endif // VICUS_WindowH
